title: Cat Quest II (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Cat Quest II is now free on the Epic Games Store! Dive into a "fur-tastic" open-world action-RPG set in a fantasy realm ruled by cats and dogs. It's like if Tolkien had a thing for whiskers and wagging tails! Don't let this opportunity slip through your paws!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Dying Light: 10th Anniversary Bundle (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Claim your free Dying Light: 10th Anniversary Bundle (DLC) and unlock the Hotshot Outfit, Dawnbreaker shotgun, the radiant Sunburst revolver, and the Golden Idol machete. Please note the base game is required to enjoy this DLC content.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Install the base game via Epic Games Store
3. Add and Install this DLC before the offer expires.
